revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:AFX_Laughter}}This is one of the [[sound sequence]]s used for ''[[Heretic]]'''s [[ambient sound]]s. Although it is played from {{Class|HereticSoundSequence9}}, it can also be used independently.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Laughter environment 8 slot [[HereticAmbience]]
playtime world/amb9 16 volumerel -3.15 playtime world/amb9 16 volumerel -3.15 playtime world/amb9 16 volumerel -3.15 playtime world/amb10 16 volumerel -3.15 playtime world/amb10 16 volumerel -3.15 playuntildone world/amb10 end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
